sys_variable_value.value: Content Review Request Number: ${number} has been submitted
// Set the variable 'answer' to a comma-separated list of user or group sys_ids that you want the email sent to.

// Set the variable 'answer' to a comma-separated list of user or group sys_ids that you want the email sent to.
1. Review media Attachements 2. If necessary send back to Hotel or send to the Copywriters
// Set 'answer' to the number of seconds this timer should wait answer = 0;

// Set 'answer' to the number of seconds this timer should wait answer = 0;
// Set the variable 'answer' to a comma-separated list of user or group sys_ids that you want the email sent to.
Your request Number: ${number} - ${short_description} has been completed by the Content Operations team !!
Your request Number: ${number} - ${short_description} has been completed by the Content Operations team !!
// Set the variable 'answer' to a comma-separated list of user or group sys_ids that you want the email sent to.
// Set 'answer' to the number of seconds this timer should wait answer = 0;
1. Check the Room description "new" content 2. If necessary send the conent back to Hotel for review or send to Copywrtiters
